input_text:
Job Title: Sign Installer

Location: Torrance, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
An established and growing sign company is looking for an experienced Sign Installer.

Responsibilities | Sign Installer

Installation of signs and various support structures. This includes the drilling and pouring of concrete foundations.Completes all paperwork as required by management such as work orders, material lists, etc.Ensures signs, pipe and other related materials are loaded and secured properly and safely.Performs general maintenance on company trucks and equipment. This includes the general appearance both inside and outside, as well as general care and security of company vehicles and equipment.Performs necessary housekeeping activities; this includes, but is not limited to, the picking up of all debris that results from installation activities, proper storage of all materials and equipment when they are not in use as well as all other materials which may be offensive or hazardous.Demonstrates flexibility in work hours to include availability for overtime hours as required by management.Be able to safely and efficiently perform the physical requirements of this position.Attend all necessary meetings and training as required.Carefully manage and provide security to/for all company resources.

Qualifications | Sign Installer

3+ years of experience installing exterior and interior signage required. Crane, Forklift, Aerial Lift certifications preferred, but not required.Experience working with a bucket truck, crane, aerial lift, scissor lift required. Proficient in reading and interpreting blueprints or construction drawings. High Attention to detail. Effective communication skills in both written and verbal formats.

Benefits

Health Benefits, 401k, PTO, vacation, FSA plan, hospital indemnity, sick leave4/10 workweek (typically don't work on Fridays)

Please submit a confidential resume for consideration. Only those qualified applicants with a provided resume will be contacted.

For immediate consideration: Call Lisa Fox at (737) 825-2609

Resumes may be sent confidentially to lisa.fox@gogpac.com

Let's connect on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/lisa-fox-55b182286/

All qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, age, color, sex (including pregnancy), religion, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, military status, genetic information, or any other status protected by applicable laws or regulations.

GPAC (Growing People and Companies) is an award-winning search firm specializing in placing quality professionals within multiple industries across the United States since 1990. We are extremely competitive, client-focused and realize that our value is in our ability to deliver the right solutions at the right time.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Sign Installer
output_json.summary: An experienced Sign Installer is sought after by a growing sign company in Torrance, CA.
job_responsibilities: Installation of signs and support structures
Completion of paperwork including work orders and material lists
Maintenance of company trucks and equipment
Demonstration of flexibility in work hours
output_json.physical_requirements: Physical ability to perform the job duties
output_json.company_information: An established and growing sign company
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: All qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, age, color, sex, religion, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, military status, genetic information, or any other status protected by applicable laws or regulations.
